channel.title: Cloud on Daniel Cardoza
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Daniel Cardoza

item.title: Stratocumulus.cloud
item.description: TL:DR https://stratocumulus.cloud Top level domains (TLD) Every so often, I encounter a new top level domain (TLD). TLDs are at the topmost level of domains. A few of the most common are .com, .org, .net and if you are a trendy startup, .io. You can retrieve a full list of TLDs on wikipedia. Below are some of my favourite TLDs with various subdomains. .ninja coding.ninja sneaky.ninja food.ninja .rocks exercise.rocks igneous.rocks ilove.rocks .life thegood.life theeasy.life simple.life .news fake.news real.news thegood.news When a new TLD comes out, most of the interesting domains are snatched up quite quickly.
